job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering tasks using Go, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It lacks the core responsibilities and technologies associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to building and maintaining software systems, specifically focusing on the backend, APIs, and data handling services, which are core components of software development.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates an environment where open communication and collaboration are valued.
The mention of rapid scaling implies a dynamic environment where adaptability and learning are likely necessary.
This phrase directly points to a pragmatic and efficient approach to problem-solving.

phrases: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
soft_skills.justification: This suggests an environment where individuals can take initiative, influence direction, and own their work.
